content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest in my apartment, Juan. As a landlord, I would like to ensure that I am getting the best possible rental price for this property. May I ask what you are willing to pay for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am willing to pay 750 Euros per month for the apartment.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your offer, Juan. I appreciate your interest in the apartment. However, I would like to suggest a higher rental price. I believe that the market value of this apartment warrants a rental price of 900 Euros per month. Would you be willing to consider this higher rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I understand your point of view, but I am unable to pay that amount. I am a student and I have limited funds. I can only offer 750 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I see. Thank you for your understanding, Juan. However, I am afraid that I will need to decline your offer of 750 Euros per month. I believe that the market value of this apartment warrants a rental price of at least 850 Euros per month. If you are unable to pay this amount, I would recommend looking for a different apartment that better fits your budget. Thank you for your interest in my property.
name: Heinrich Heine
